page.title: 14STATION HOUSE BORWICK
page.content: {Borwick station}is about 1 mile from {Borwick Hall.}The station is closed down but the trains still go by.The {Hammet family}have lived in the old station for{17}years and the ticket office is next door.There is another house like it which was built to be the original station,but was built in the wrong place so the{Hammet's}house was built.The{Griffith's}live next door at{Roland House.}Their house used to be a train shed where the trains were kept and repaired.Next door to them is Kitson House which used to be a school.Sometimes in the Summer steam engines go by like the{"Flying {Scotsman."
